item.title: About
item.description: My contacts: Email: kov4l3nko@gmail.com (you can use my PGP public key) Twitter: @kov4l3nko GitHub: https://github.com/kov4l3nko From time to time I do researches for money, but there are some rules: no illegal researches no researches for Iran, Sudan, Syria, North Korea and Russia no security researches for China (non-security researches are allowed) QR-coded link to this page:
